#### <s class="topic-title">[[Indriya]]</s>

Translated as sense organs, these are the medium through which our mind receives information from the world.
^[[[notes - How to achieve]]]

Create:: [[Samskara]]

**See**:: [[mind]], [[body]]
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
